content: How cool! No longer a Conspiracy theory. Maybe "national treasure" was not so far off afterall. Eitched inside the watch: "Jonathan Dillon April 13 - 1861," part of the inscription reads, "Fort Sumpter (sic) was attacked by the rebels on the above date." Another part reads, "Thank God we have a government." "http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/03/11/lincolns-pocket-watch-eng_n_173871.html"

title: Lincoln's Watch: Hidden Civil War Message Inside, Museum Reveals
